title: Base Agent Tool
description: The base schema for a tool that can be used by a LlamaIndex agent, defining its input and output contracts.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

tool_name.description: The unique, machine-readable name of the tool.

input_schema.description: A reference to the JSON schema for the tool's input parameters.

output_schema.description: A reference to the JSON schema for the tool's return value.
